None.Name: Tainted Necro Strike
None.Description: Activate to ram the unit against an enemy structure dealing 2740 damage. It will be destroyed during the attack but a Ripper will spawn out of its remains that additionally contaminate an area of 20m radius dealing 40 damage per second to every enemy within it. Lasts for 15 seconds.
